pageContext.claim: “They say, 'Well listen, we love the president, but if he can't win -- 'So ABC -- But they did it four years ago and we complained bitterly with a very good lawyer. I had very good lawyers in those days. We complained very bitterly, and they changed it right before the election.”
pageContext.analysis: As noted above, this was a tracking poll. Scott Clement, the Washington Post polling director, does not recall receiving any letters from the Trump campaign about the poll. And certainly The Post would not alter the poll in response to any such letter.
